# tabViewSidebar

**Type Property**

The tab view sidebar. This is present on certain platforms when using the `.sidebarAdaptable` tab view style.

## Declaration

```swift
static let tabViewSidebar: ContentToolbarPlacement
```
title: tabViewSidebar
